title: Vampire
description:
A vampire shown wearing a dark cape, and with pointed fangs. This emoji supports skin tones, and variations that are female or male.

May be used to call someone an "energy vampire", i.e. a person whose actions leave others exhausted or drained of energy
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the vampire emoji embodies a creature of the night with a touch of playful mystique, characterized by sharp features and an alluring aura. This rendition showcases a pale complexion, often enhanced by a hint of dramatic blush or shadow, and piercing eyes that convey a knowing gaze, all rendered with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and realistic lighting. The classic silhouette of a cape, often a deep crimson or stark black, flows dramatically around the figure, its soft rounded edges adding a stylized elegance.  This emoji is perfect for conveying a sense of the spooky, the mysterious, or a bit of playful mischief, especially during Halloween or when hinting at something darkly enchanting on Apple devices.
